trends: There have been no other sightings in Hubbardston
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was sitting on the bed of my truck in my driveway and I was looking at the stars. I noticed a star that looked as though it was shifting side to side. As I continued watching, it appeared to not be a star but more of a unconfined object of light that was making circular rotations as it slowly moved around in a small area of the sky. I felt enticed to continue watching it, and intrigued by its interesting motions. After watching it for approximately forty minutes, I went inside. When I went back outside about two hours later, it was no longer in the sky.
Summary: multi-colored light moving in circular rotations making slight movements around a possibly specific area.
